instructions.name: request_units
docs: Request additional compute units for the transaction and an optional prioritization fee.

args.name: units
docs: Units to request for transaction-wide compute.

instructions.name: request_heap_frame
docs: Request a larger per-program heap frame size for the whole transaction.

args.name: bytes
docs: Requested transaction-wide program heap size in bytes.
Must be multiple of 1024. Applies to each program, including CPIs.

instructions.name: set_compute_unit_limit
docs: Set the transaction-wide compute unit limit.

instructions.name: set_compute_unit_price
docs: Set the transaction-wide compute unit price used for prioritization fees.

args.name: micro_lamports
docs: Transaction compute unit price used for prioritization fees.

instructions.name: set_loaded_accounts_data_size_limit
docs: Set the transaction-wide loaded accounts data size limit.
